description:
Nappa is an elite Saiyajin warrior from the Planet Vegeta, and http://anidb.net/ch2105 [Vegeta]`s partner in combat. Prior to the destruction of Planet Vegeta, Nappa was the General of the Saiyajin army and aid/partner to the young http://anidb.net/ch2105 [Prince Vegeta] as well.
His name is a pun off of Chinese cabbage.
name: Nappa
